message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more since I'm proposing.
I think I deserve a bit more since I'm being patient and the money is losing value for me.
The value is decreasing for you Bob, it's better to take a little less now than even less later.
I'll take a bit more to compensate for the loss of value, but still giving you a good share.
Bob, let's end this. A 50/50 split is fair and any more delays will only hurt you due to the inflation.
